title: Alb(i)um Intimilium/Albintimilium
description: Alb(i)um Intimilium/Albintimilium (modern Ventimiglia) was the capital of the Ligurian tribe of the Intemelii and was captured by Marcus Aemilius Scaurus in 115 BC.

properties.description: The area where the archaeological remains of the Roman city have been excavated since the late 19th century.
properties.title: Archaeological remains
